label: defined()
detail: Function (# ifndef ABSL_FLAGS_DECLARE_H_ # define ABSL_FLAGS_DECLARE_H_ # include " absl / base / config . h " namespace absl { ABSL_NAMESPACE_BEGIN namespace flags_internal { template<T> class Flag ; } # if)

label: ABSL_DECLARE_FLAG()
detail: Function (# else template<T> using Flag = flags_internal::Flag<T> ; # endif ABSL_NAMESPACE_END } # define)
